nodes.text: Sagamore was an astronomical object which was the homeworld of the Kotabi bond-twins Terec and Ceret.

Sagamore was first mentioned in Cavan Scott's 2021 novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm. The novel states that it is the home of the Kotabi twins Terec and Ceret, from Scott's Star Wars: The High Republic comic series. However, this contradicts the StarWars.com article which first identified the twins, as it said they were from Kotab.
